examples.example: 购物结束后，我很有礼貌地去柜台结帐。

translate.english: After shopping, I went to the counter to checkout politely.

examples.example: 吃完饭后，我微笑着去前台结帐。

translate.english: After having a meal, I smiled and went to the front desk to pay the bill.

examples.example: 我在超市选完商品后，便有序地去结帐。

translate.english: After I finish selecting goods in the supermarket, I will go to checkout orderly.
